title: LinkTV-Cooking in the Danger Zone-Uganda
description:
Cooking in the Danger Zone


Cooking in the Danger Zone is a documentary television series produced by the BBC and presented by Stefan Gates.



linktv sdtv xvid



In this fascinating BBC series, food writer Stefan Gates explores unusual food stories in some of the world&#039;s more dangerous places.


Uganda




Eye-opening culinary exploration of danger hot spots around the world. Food writer Stefan Gates visits refugee camps in Uganda to see how people live on meagre UN rations. 




"Uganda" 

Gates visits refugee camps in war-torn Northern Uganda, to find out how people survive on meagre UN food rations. The UN gives them just 60% of their daily needs.
